website_summaries.verdict: The Vitamix Ascent 3500 blender’s expensive high-tech tricks won’t thrill you, and neither should its less-than-stellar food blending.
pros: The Vitamix Ascent 3500 blender is easy to use and clean
It has a handsome design that feels durable
cons: It doesn’t blend as well as other high-performance blenders including the Vitamix 7500
Its high-tech features either cost extra or don’t greatly enhance its abilities

customer_reviews.title: Only the best blender EVER!
customer_reviews.text: My Vitamix arrived today. If you have been on the fence about getting one do it! This is a game changer. I love making cashew sour cream for my rice and bean bowls. The jar on the top is the sour cream from my old blender. The cashews were soaked for 14 hours prior to making it. I had used my Ninja blender. On the bottom, same recipe made with my Vitamix. Didn't even have to soak the cashews! Look how creamy it is. This amazing kitchen appliance certainly make living a vegan lifestyle much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 1 Best investment i ever made
customer_reviews.text: OMG!1!1 Best investment i ever made. I've only had it for a few weeks and i don't know how i lived without it. I make almond milk, nut butter, smoothies, juicing, sauces....... This machine replaces a food processor and a juicer. Worth the money. I already started losing weight due to the healthy foods i can make with this blender. Very smooth for those who are texture people like myself, and efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Spice

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best!
customer_reviews.text: We love it! Much quieter than our noisy Blendec and seems like a more effective blend. Wish we had switched sooner. Out Blendec got to the point where it was so loud i did not want to use it. We saw this Vitamix being used at Sur la table and were impressed with the quieter operation, very glad we switched!
customer_reviews.author: EEH

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price, Container too big, alternative containers not an option
customer_reviews.text: Likes: great consistencies it created, it’s ability to blend nuts was impressive, Dislikes: blender ‘bucket’ way too big, difficult to make smaller recipes, designed for making huge quantities, the preprogrammed options didn’t prove to useful, it did not make a good ice cream despite trying three times, no smaller attachments or containers available to purchase, way to expensive
customer_reviews.author: Brian McGregor

customer_reviews.title: NO POWER
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to receive this product. I did countless hours of research and reviews and evryone said this product is the one to buy for a lifetime of worry free blending. I was worried becuase of the substantial price. Despite my better judgment I made the purchase. So far I have not seen anything superior about this blender it is a nice design and looks good. However, the power on this thing is a joke. If I attempt to blend anything thats frozen or even remotely solid the blender seizes up. All i can really say is Im so disappointed. Its an amazing design but no power.
customer_reviews.author: elijah

customer_reviews.title: Red Alert - you will be disappointed with high-end Vitamix
customer_reviews.text: Red alert - do not purchase. Bought 2 different Vitamix with same problem. Could not even crush frozen berries. Tried to use tamper to stir and assist motor and transmission, but couldn’t even blend frozen berries without motor spinning and blade freezing. High end speed is good, but if using any frozen materials, any $100 blender will out-perform.
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: It's a Vitamix. You already know.
customer_reviews.text: I held out for a long time before getting a Vitamix. After my 3rd Nutribullet, I decided I might as well spring for a Vitamix, given the 10 yr Waranty. So far I love it! My only issue is portions. Its harder to make 1/2 a pitcher as there will be more pulp. A full pitcher gets you a smoother drink. And the smaller blending cups are overpriced, so for smaller drinks I still go back to Nutribullet.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: A MUST have!
customer_reviews.text: I seriously love love my Vitamix! I am an avid review reader and spent countless hours researching to find the perfect one. Quality packaging, great attention to detail. Arrived ahead of schedule. Comes with a cookbook...I’ve made so many things already but butternut squash soup is my favorite! I use my Vitamix daily! This is a Must have! I’d rate this 6 stars if it was an option.
customer_reviews.author: The Timms

customer_reviews.title: He Loves this Blender
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband who loves smoothies and making stuff fresh in the blender. We upgraded from a Ninja to this Vitamix and it was the best decision ever! The power to this blender is amazing. Smoothies are so delicious and we have made so many things in it. We love the book it came with for recipe ideas.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Best blender you can get!
customer_reviews.text: After doing a long research I decide to purchase the A3500 as gift to my wife. We had previously had the 7500 and we were very happy with it but we are in love with the A3500. The blender looks really nice and works very well. Hadn’t have the chance to use all the functions yet but I’m confident it won’t disappoint. It’s a powerful machine and also a little loud but it’s part of it! Also, we really like the smart functions and the pre programmed buttons. So convenient!!! If you need a powerful and beautiful blender go for it!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Bulhões

customer_reviews.title: Dead on Arrival!
customer_reviews.text: After doing considerable research, I decided to go for the Vitamix A3500. While it took a couple of days more to arrive than alternatives, it seemed worth the wait. Unboxed the NEW blender today, and nothing. Called support and walked through all the obvious issues. Now we have to send it back, and Vitamix want the old one back before they will ship the new one, so even more delays. At nearly $600 for a blender, I would expect better reliability / testing and better customer support (how about you send one out ASAP?)
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Low

customer_reviews.title: Awesome blender. Should have skipped the NutriBullet a long ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome blender. Should have skipped the NutriBullet a long time ago! This is the only model with a timer, programs and self-cleaning. The timer is a nice touch to see how much time is left. Probably not necessary if you don't plan to do manual programs. You could probably get away with one without the self-cleaning program by using the smoothies program.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: This is so nice blender. I bought it from Japan via Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This is so nice blender. I bought it from Japan via Amazon.com. I am living in Kansai area(100v 60hz), but it works. points 1. This blender has high power and tough. It can blend something solid, for example, pieces of ice and seeds of fruit into smooth liquid. 2. This has auto menus. All I have to do is (1)putting ingredients into A3500, (2)pushing a menu button, (3)pushing a start button. I had felt that it was difficult to decide when I should push the stop button. This product with auto menu has solved the problem with auto menu.
customer_reviews.author: YOSHIAKI MIZUNO

customer_reviews.title: The best blender ever
customer_reviews.text: The best blender ever. Powerful enough to process everything I am throwing at it (nuts, ice, chickpea). The smoothies are very creamy. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SO happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad that I purchased this Vitamix blender!! It works just as easily and just as well as it is advertised to do. I have had it two days now and used it several times, to make Smoothies and prepare meals. It is easy to use and so easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Linda R

customer_reviews.title: Broke in one week
customer_reviews.text: Broke in less than a week. Returned. Did not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: VJ

customer_reviews.title: Amazing so far
customer_reviews.text: Drinking smoothies everyday now! Very pricy for it not to come thing the $20 attachment for the tamper holder . This seems to be a business plan to make extra cash since it’s all plastic. But besides that it works great . I’m going to try the personal bowls next and see how well the Bluetooth recognition works . This blender does work great with the vitamix scale too!
customer_reviews.author: iceywhite

customer_reviews.title: Love my Vitamix
customer_reviews.text: Thank you, Amazon for your assistance with my initial purchase. This machine is what I was expecting. I've been using Vitamix machines for over 25 years and this one is just another step up. I've been on a juice fast since receiving it, and have already lost 2% body fat and about 13 pounds. Go Vitamix!
customer_reviews.author: jd

customer_reviews.title: Computer in this model breaks constantly
customer_reviews.text: The product is great when it is not throwing errors, but the computer in this is junk. The system will display an error, and then I turn everything off, restart it and it immediately errors out again (even with nothing but water in the blender). I would not take a chance on the one with a computer and just go with the old and trusted original version.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Blender!
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted a Vitamix but they are very expensive. I'm glad i decided to spend the money, you get what you pay for and this is a high quality machine. I've made soup, smoothies, sauces, and ice cream and is easy to use. Push a button and walk away. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes the perfect smoothie but is loud as a jet engine
customer_reviews.text: Makes the perfect smoothie but is loud as a jet engine. I guess that's the downside of having a motor with POWAHHHH
customer_reviews.author: Ting Z.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the cost!
customer_reviews.text: This Vitamix has exceeded our expectations. Extremely easy to use and a breeze to clean. The included recipe book guides you through the various features, making anyone a pro in no time.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Whittle

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it!
customer_reviews.text: love the new Vitamix A3500! Showing it next to our old Cuisinart blender. This thing is a beast. Got the scale that pairs with the blender...best smoothies ever!
customer_reviews.author: Rglennan

customer_reviews.title: Great blender, but struggles with low quantity blending
customer_reviews.text: I like this blender but it has a hard time with low quantity blending. It is way better than the blender I had before though.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I’m not super techy anymore but this was super easy to work! I love the cookbook. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kylee

customer_reviews.title: Better than the rest
customer_reviews.text: Been through cuisinart, breville, ninja.....this thus far trumps them all hands down
customer_reviews.author: Olumide A.

customer_reviews.title: Best smoothies and a good food processor
customer_reviews.text: Best blender you will ever own! It can do most anything!
customer_reviews.author: Kiera

customer_reviews.title: Vitamix A3500
customer_reviews.text: I took delivery of this for a friend who did not want it shipped to their address. I am told it works well and is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Cygnus Rider

customer_reviews.title: This is a REAL powerhouse
customer_reviews.text: This is a well designed, powerful blender that I use to make the best smoothies I have ever had. It makes it easy to get my veggies, greens and fruit in a delicious and convenient smoothie. I'm lovn' it!!
customer_reviews.author: Ken Warren

customer_reviews.title: Great Blender
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, strong motor, can do anything blender. we use it often and works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Powerful machine. And lot quieter compared to my other blender (Nutri Ninja).
customer_reviews.author: JDiBs

customer_reviews.title: Can’t hook up to the Vitamix App!!
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed that this cant hook up to the Vitamix App- for the money paid it should. I should have gotten the cheaper model- it hooks up to the App for recipes and timers..... it works fine- maybe not worth spending so much $$
customer_reviews.author: IBattybunch

customer_reviews.title: Top notch quality
customer_reviews.text: Had lots of blenders in the past and this is just amazing. We use it for soups and green smoothies. Can't speak of the Bluetooth function since we never used it.
customer_reviews.author: DSK

customer_reviews.title: Everything I ever wanted... in a blender.
customer_reviews.text: I love this blender. Only thing that irks me is that I need a dry container and it didn’t come with it.
customer_reviews.author: Carl H Jean-baptiste

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Not much bad to say about this blender. I'm surprised that I haven't had to use the plunger much at all when making smoothies. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Great product. You have to make life style changes ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. You have to make life style changes to use it. So far we are doing good.
customer_reviews.author: desi

customer_reviews.title: Powerfull device
customer_reviews.text: Not very loud sound when working and extremelly powerfull. My drinks get an excellent form. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Castro

customer_reviews.title: Shipper sent me the wrong color
customer_reviews.text: I gave this product five stars because it deserves it but I returned it because the shipper sent me the wrong color, not only that when I received the blender, the box was already opened as if someone had already returned it too.
customer_reviews.author: sheyi azeez

customer_reviews.title: Blending bliss!!
customer_reviews.text: Blends everything, not as loud as my old Ninja! Love the preset timers, makes life a lot easier. Starts out slow then amps up! Love it
customer_reviews.author: Tebs G

customer_reviews.title: Great blender. My green smoothies are blended so well ...
customer_reviews.text: So worth it. Great blender. My green smoothies are blended so well it is unbelievable.
customer_reviews.author: linda werbick

customer_reviews.title: Like a sexy BMW.
customer_reviews.text: Was a little weary of such a high tech blender but....It has been amazing. Like a sexy BMW revving up and down while making the perfect smoothy consistency I have ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin L.

customer_reviews.title: OMG....I'm now one of those nut job true believers who swear by VITAMIX
customer_reviews.text: I love the Vitamix A3500....within 15 minutes of it's arrival I was drinking my first DELICIOUS green frozen smoothie and pondering my next culinary adventure. After watching many videos online I was a pro with the tamper and was also prepared for the various sounds coming from the machine. A regular blender would have blown itself up on that first drink LOL....THANKS VITAMIX....the machine is so well built and I love the program settings. The chocolate and spinach frozen smoothies are to die for....so easy to make. With the new smaller containers coming out I can't wait to make some fresh ground spices. This machine is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: A Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Every day use
customer_reviews.text: We have a nutribullet and it just wasn’t cutting it. This thing is a hoss. Does everything. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Ben C.

customer_reviews.title: Best damn money I’ve ever spent
customer_reviews.text: Obliterates everything and puts the “smooth” in smoothie. It’s like a jet engine blender, and I find any excuse to use it.
customer_reviews.author: zebrapedestrian

customer_reviews.title: Power is strong. Sound is loud
customer_reviews.text: The sound is very loud, but the power is strong. My wife uses this every day. It seems that cooking has become fun.
customer_reviews.author: AI

customer_reviews.title: Something to get in your kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: It is the best blender in the market. Professional grade.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Francois

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love, total upgrade for me. Had 5200, which was still running strong, but wanted a newer model. Splurged!
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Best smoothies ever.
customer_reviews.text: Takes a few tries to figure it out but after that it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: HKPettis

customer_reviews.title: Finally !!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved everything about it, it latterly can do everything for you, the programmed setup makes your life easier, it is a health investment 😍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Vitamix is a great product worth the price of you seek good value.
customer_reviews.author: John Fox

customer_reviews.title: It’s so silent!
customer_reviews.text: My valentine gift! Happy lovers day! A gift that keeps on giving!
customer_reviews.author: E.B.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome machine! Great seller
customer_reviews.text: Amazing blunder. It is a very universal tool we use it for so many more things than we thought we would
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Liquify a golf ball
customer_reviews.text: Straight to the point, you can blend anything in this thing. The consistent texture of my smoothies no matter what I put in there is amazing velvety smooth and so dang good. It is expensive, but it is worth it. Great company who makes a great product. I recommend buying one that has presets because the vitamix is smarter than you when it comes to blending. I tried to make a smoothie with the manual settings and I failed. I used the preset and bam! 100% better than my first attempt. Get this blender you won’t be disappointed. The ninja blender, the blendtec and really any other blender just do not compare. They are not comparable, do not be fooled.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Quid

customer_reviews.title: The settings are great!!!
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about it.. I love the different settings & it's always mixed smooth for my smoothies.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Clark

customer_reviews.title: The multi uses you have at your disposal
customer_reviews.text: The brand speaks for itself. Possibly the only blender you will ever need.
customer_reviews.author: Andres

customer_reviews.title: very good and easy to use nice design and color this ...
customer_reviews.text: very good and easy to use nice design and color this make less noise.
customer_reviews.author: WOOYOUNG KIM

customer_reviews.title: Worth to buy it
customer_reviews.text: This blender is perfect compare to many brands I have used.
customer_reviews.author: martin

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the expen$e
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it. That's all I need to say.
customer_reviews.author: KEVIN C. DELAHANTY

customer_reviews.title: ... have one of the smaller models and my girls loved it. I got one for both daughters they ...
customer_reviews.text: I have one of the smaller models and my girls loved it. I got one for both daughters they are vegetarians and use it everyday, they say how did they live without it. My daughter also uses this mixer to make baby food.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Young

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic. When my 22 year old daughter saw it
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. When my 22 year old daughter saw it, she said to her mom “ I want to inherit this blender”.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love this so much
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this so much, but it doesn't work. I debated on a vitamix, and I didn't skimp on cost.This struggles on smoothies, gets stuck, ramps up to a 10 out of control for no apparent reason. I'm guessing this is refurbished? I might give Vitamix one more chance, but I'm looking at a Blend-tec now.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: I read other reviews about loud noise and best blending ever
customer_reviews.text: I read other reviews about loud noise and best blending ever. Well compared to the standard oster blender that I've owned for years (2 of them), they are so loud you have to stop conversation. This blender is 30-35% quieter and can easily converse up to level 8. But you don't use level 9-10 but for short seconds. Add for performance, I had no idea this level of blending was even possible. I'm in awe over how smooth, cloud-like my smoothies and piña coladas come out. This alone justified the expense of this machine! Wow! Didn't even know ice could break down like this and still be frozen - I'm in shock.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Purées food into oblivion.
customer_reviews.text: I am able to hide kale and dates and beets etc in my kid’s smoothie bc this pulverizes everything that goes in. If I’m worried about him detecting the greens, I run the smoothie program twice. Love this thing.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: It blends and its quiet(er)
customer_reviews.text: So far I've only made asparagus soup but it was extremely impressive in doing so. In 6 minutes, the soup was puréed, creamy, thick, and hot. And this version is a lot quieter than any previous version.
customer_reviews.author: Adam from Indiana

customer_reviews.title: Very nice but will not replace food processor
customer_reviews.text: While I do enjoy the blender, don't throw out your food processor; I could not make tahini with it. There may be an accessory you can buy that would accomplish such tasks, but you won't be able to use it for certain items with the default setup.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gray

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Blender!  Love the pre-programmed Buttons.
customer_reviews.text: My wife wanted this blender because she was constantly making smoothies that weren't very smooth. It is incredibly easy to use. We use the pre programmed buttons more than we thought we would. It is very nice to load up a smoothie and then clean up the ingredients while it is blending. Cleaning is a breeze, especially using the cleaning button. We use it all the time and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: NB

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. The container is big and I would need to order something smaller if I want to use it more frequently. We make smoothies and it's great if there is more than 2 people as this container makes at least 4 glasses. This is not a bad thing but seems like a waste of a container to make anything less. We would like to use it more so we will order a smaller container so we can make other items on a smaller scale. Love it and would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Mihir M Patel

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PURCHASE!
customer_reviews.text: Great appliance - certainly worth the price. I love that it has a digital read-out, but also has a physical knob as well. The brushed stainless is BEAUTIFUL! AND it fits perfectly on my counter top, with the canister in place - which is HUGE for me. (I had the Vitamix 5200 for around 12 years and it still worked, but would not fit on my counter top unless the canister was removed.) The A3500 also comes with a 10 YEAR WARRANTEE!!! Who does that? Vitamix does - woohoo!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase I’ve ever made. I will never go back to another blender after using a Vitamix, this machine does it all, smooth green juices, creamy smoothies & açaí bowels, I’ve made soups, hummus, frozen yogurt you name it. Definitely worth the price, I would highly recommend it to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Edmarys

customer_reviews.title: The best of the best
customer_reviews.text: This blender will not disappoint. Does it all, with style. Every breakfast smoothie, margarita and milkshake or malt is done to perfection. Single button routines for all make it simple to use and easy to clean. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Chipster

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Have made fresh hot delicious asparagus soup
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Have made fresh hot delicious asparagus soup. It pulverizes flaxseed into flour. And makes good blizzard-type desserts.
customer_reviews.author: Jelda

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best blender. We use it everyday and love it. You're not going to find a better blender when it comes to grinding stuff. You won't see seeds of any kind. We are very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lionel

customer_reviews.title: LOVING THIS MACHINE
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love with this machine! I wanted a stainless steel one and was weary about buying it on here, but been very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: No need to shop - just get a Vitamix!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this Vitamix. It’s my second one - the first one is still amazing but I gave it to my daughter’s family to make baby food for a new baby!!
customer_reviews.author: joan hughes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not just a blender but THEE BLENDER I have been using it everyday since I got it and it's fantastic. Money well spent, it does everything they said it would do.
customer_reviews.author: Howie

customer_reviews.title: Best blender so far
customer_reviews.text: I should have bought this blender a long time ago. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Stephon

customer_reviews.title: Love my Vitamix!
customer_reviews.text: This is a dream come true! User friendly and works like a charm. It’s very loud but my smoothies come out so perfectly and it’s a beautiful appliance to add to the countertop. So glad I splurged on this
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Holmes

customer_reviews.title: I like the face of the machine since it sits on ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the face of the machine since it sits on my counter and I like the presets much more than I expected. However, the machine hangs up on some food and I get the smell of hot circuitry. I have to keep the tamper handy just in case and have had to shut the machine off to stop the lockup. The worst I ever experienced was with potato soup. Who would have known potato soup could be so viscus?
customer_reviews.author: McR

customer_reviews.title: Don't get the touch control models
customer_reviews.text: Works great, but sometimes it stops. Don't know if I brush the touch controls or something else is happening. I wish I hadn't gotten the touch controls. It is easy to clean though.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Chertov

customer_reviews.title: 100% worth it! - if you have the money....
customer_reviews.text: The best blender you can get, it has made a differeence from previous unexpensive blenders we had at home. 1- it cleans itself 2- you will taste a true smoothie grade with your mixes 3-it is fast!
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Waddington

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I never seen an appliance make my wife happier. This mixer is awesome. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. So glad to have a replacement unit ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. So glad to have a replacement unit due to the loss of our old one in a house fire. This unit is better and fits on the counter under the upper cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Slmtlm in TN

customer_reviews.title: Blendtastic
customer_reviews.text: Awesome machine! Blends things super smooth and very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: thekitkatkid

customer_reviews.title: ... excited to use the vita mix but I was disappointed because for a one portion smoothie many times it ...
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to use the vita mix but I was disappointed because for a one portion smoothie many times it wouldn’t weight and do automatically. It does work well but what is the point to pay for an electric tool that doesn’t work. Then is better to have the normal one and pay probably 200 less. On top of that I have to pay to return it. Not happy
customer_reviews.author: Mimi74

product_meta.title: Vitamix A3500 Brushed Stainless Blender
feature_bullets: Five program settings: smoothies, hot soups, dips and spreads, frozen desserts and self-cleaning
Auto adjusts blending times and speeds for the specific container used and stops when complete
Built-in digital timer and Variable Speed Control streamline manual recipes
Convenient, under-cabinet profile that fits easily in kitchens of every size

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars239 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
